means: 论述，详细讲解( expound的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Soon Gandhi was expounding the doctrine of ahimsa ( nonviolence ).
sentence.Network_cn: 不久甘地就四出阐释 非暴力 主义思想.

sentence.Network_en: He was expounding, of course, his philosophy of leadership.
sentence.Network_cn: 当然, 他这是在阐述他的领导哲学.

sentence.Network_en: Most likely found: Expounding assorted conspiracy and cover - up theories.
sentence.Network_cn: 最有可能被发现的: 阐释各种阴谋理论.

PerfectNetExp.abs: and to have had before my eyes a man who clearly considered his experience and his skill in expounding philosophical principles as the smallest of his merits ;他向我展示了一个人如何以解释性的哲学原理清晰地思考自己的经验和技能，并把这看成自己最微不足道的德行；
expounded 论述了, expounding 引伸法, expounder 立言

list.abs: they expound & glorify their own doctrines , but as for the doctrines of others , they deprecate them , revile show contempt for them , & disparage them .他们阐述、颂扬自己的教义，但是对于他人的教义，则贬低、辱骂、鄙视、毁谤。
expound是什么意思... ... generally expound ： 广泛地论述 expound elaborate ： 论证阐述 expound elaborate ： 阐明陈述.

basedon the systematical analysis of ball grinding process , the research status of factors having effects on millingand crushing of grinder was expounded emphatically .在概述球磨过程系统分析的基础上，重点论述了影响磨机粉碎效果的有关因素的研究现状。
the demands of PCCP for prestressed wire are expounded emphatically from such aspects as chemical .从化学成分、组织、钢丝的拉拔、微合金化措施等方面重点阐述PCCP对预应力钢丝的要求。
The third part expounds varieties which news media betrays human solicitude at present ., 第三部分阐述了目前新闻传媒对人文关怀的种种背叛.

entry.def: If you expound an idea or opinion, you give a clear and detailed explanation of it.

example.ex: Schmidt continued to expound his views on economics and politics.
example.tran: 施密特继续阐述他的经济和政治观点。

means.word_mean: 1. a systematic interpretation or explanation (usually written) of a specific topic

auth_sentence.content: Expounding and developing the doctrines in a series of books.
auth_sentence.res_content: Expounding and developing the doctrines in a series of books.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Expounding and developing the doctrines in a series of books.

auth_sentence.content: But do they present a thorough, documented expounding of their own so-called 'theory'?
auth_sentence.res_content: But do they present a thorough, documented expounding of their own so-called 'theory'?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But do they present a thorough, documented expounding of their own so-called 'theory'?

auth_sentence.content: He is especially sensitive to the charge that he is expounding "Whig history", a story of inexorable progress.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is especially sensitive to the charge that he is expounding "Whig history", a story of inexorable progress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is especially sensitive to the charge that he is expounding "Whig history", a story of inexorable progress.
